participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was opened by the PM, and then the ID and UID brought in the prototype.
The prototype was admired and discussed by the team, using the ME's evaluation criteria.
We reached group consensus on the evaluation.
Then, we examined the financial aspect.
We filled in the Excel sheet and came to find the prototype was within budget.
Lastly, we evaulated the production process through group discussion and the PM closed the meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: decided the prototype was within budget.
